scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'npx babel-node src/index.js' --ignore src/actions/temp --watch src
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'npx babel-node src/tests/index.js' --ignore src/actions/temp --watch src
scripts.start: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.start:tests: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/tests/index.js
